abstract: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for the most interesting items on the Web. Today’s selection includes items on brokering your personal information, Google Maps, and Evite’s new service.
snippet: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for the most interesting items on the Web. Today’s selection includes items on brokering your personal information, Google Maps, and Evite’s new service.
lead_paragraph: Here’s what the tech reporters and editors of The New York Times found on the Web. The full list can be found in the right hand column of Bits.

headline.main: Today’s Scuttlebot: The Convenience Economy and Personal Data as Currency
